InDataTable-to-V2.fullExampleBefore:
<!-- V1 Implementation -->
<template>
  <InDataTable
    name="users-table"
    api-mode
    fetch-url="/api/users"
    :table-fields="[
      { field: 'name', label: 'Name', sortable: true },
      { field: 'email', label: 'Email', width: 200 },
      { field: 'status', label: 'Status', renderer: 'status' }
    ]"
    :table-search-params="{ tenant: tenantId }"
    :per-page="25"
    :sort-order="{ field: 'name', direction: 'asc' }"
    :actions="[
      { name: 'edit', icon: 'edit', label: 'Edit' },
      { name: 'delete', icon: 'trash', label: 'Delete' }
    ]"
    :http-options="{ headers: { 'Authorization': token } }"
    pagination-path="meta.pagination"
    pagination-status
    with-search-filter
    with-status-filter
    :status-list="statusOptions"
    horizontal-scroll
    fix-first-column
    fix-last-column
    is-wrapper-box
    no-data-title="No users found"
    no-data-description="Try adjusting your filters"
    :format-mapping="{ createdAt: formatDate }"
    @on-load="handleLoad"
    @select-status="handleSelection"
    @per-page="handlePerPage"
  />
</template>

<script>
import { InDataTable } from '@useinsider/design-system-vue';

export default {
  components: { InDataTable },
  data() {
    return {
      tenantId: 'tenant-1',
      token: 'Bearer xxx',
      statusOptions: [
        { label: 'Active', value: 'active' },
        { label: 'Inactive', value: 'inactive' }
      ]
    };
  },
  methods: {
    formatDate(date) {
      return new Date(date).toLocaleDateString();
    },
    handleLoad(data) {
      console.log('Loaded', data);
    },
    handleSelection(status) {
      console.log('Selected', status.selectedRows);
    },
    handlePerPage(perPage) {
      console.log('Per page', perPage);
    }
  }
};
</script>
InDataTable-to-V2.fullExampleAfter:
<!-- V2 Implementation -->
<template>
  <InDataTableV2
    row-model-type="serverSide"
    fetch-url="/api/users"
    http-method="GET"
    :column-options="[
      { field: 'name', headerName: 'Name', sortable: true, filter: true, pinned: 'left', sort: 'asc' },
      { field: 'email', headerName: 'Email', width: 200, sortable: true, filter: true },
      { field: 'status', headerName: 'Status', cellRenderer: 'statusRenderer' },
      { field: 'createdAt', headerName: 'Created', valueFormatter: params => formatDate(params.value) },
      { field: 'actions', headerName: '', pinned: 'right', cellRenderer: 'actionsRenderer', width: 120 }
    ]"
    :table-search-params="{ tenant: tenantId }"
    :default-item-per-page="25"
    pagination-status
    items-per-page-status
    search-filter-status
    status-filter-status
    :status-filter-list="statusOptions"
    horizontal-scroll
    in-container-layout
    :in-container-layout-options="{ headerStatus: true, title: 'Users' }"
    no-data-title-text="No users found"
    no-data-description-text="Try adjusting your filters"
    rows-selection="multiple"
    can-select-all-rows
    @data-loaded="handleLoad"
    @select-status="handleSelection"
    @per-page-selected="handlePerPage"
    @fetch-data="customFetch"
  />
</template>

<script>
import { InDataTableV2 } from '@useinsider/design-system-vue';

export default {
  components: { InDataTableV2 },
  data() {
    return {
      tenantId: 'tenant-1',
      token: 'Bearer xxx',
      statusOptions: [
        { label: 'Active', value: 'active' },
        { label: 'Inactive', value: 'inactive' }
      ]
    };
  },
  methods: {
    formatDate(date) {
      return new Date(date).toLocaleDateString();
    },
    handleLoad({ data, api }) {
      console.log('Loaded', data);
    },
    handleSelection({ selectedRows, selectedCount }) {
      console.log('Selected', selectedRows);
    },
    handlePerPage(perPage) {
      console.log('Per page', perPage);
    },
    async customFetch({ params }) {
      // Handle custom API logic with auth headers
      const response = await fetch(params.url, {
        headers: { 'Authorization': this.token }
      });
      return response.json();
    }
  }
};
</script>

    open-position="right"
    @update="handleUpdate" />
</template>

<script>
export default {

      customRanges: {

      },

    };
  },
  
  computed: {

      };

InDatePicker-to-V2.fullExampleAfter:
<!-- V2 Implementation -->
<template>
  <InDatePickerV2
    id="date-picker"
    :value="datePickerValue"
    :custom-ranges="customRangesForV2"
    :disabled-range="disabledRangeForV2"
    :default-ranges="['Today', 'Yesterday', 'Last 7 Days', 'Last 30 Days', 'This Month', 'Last Month']"
    :quick-range-selection-status="true"
    calendar-popover-align="right"
    @apply="handleApply" />
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      startDate: '01/12/2024',
      endDate: '20/12/2024',
      customRanges: {
        'Q4 2024': [new Date('2024-10-01'), new Date('2024-12-31')]
      },
      disabledRange: [1704067200, 1735689599]
    };
  },
  
  computed: {
    datePickerValue() {
      return [{
        startDate: this.startDate,
        endDate: this.endDate
      }];
    },
    
    customRangesForV2() {
      return Object.entries(this.customRanges).map(([title, dates], index) => ({
        name: `custom${index + 1}`,
        title,
        startDate: this.formatDateToSlash(dates[0]),
        endDate: this.formatDateToSlash(dates[1])
      }));
    },
    
    disabledRangeForV2() {
      if (this.disabledRange && this.disabledRange.length === 2) {
        return {
          startDate: this.formatDate(new Date(this.disabledRange[0] * 1000)),
          endDate: this.formatDate(new Date(this.disabledRange[1] * 1000))
        };
      }
      return { startDate: '', endDate: '' };
    }
  },
  
  methods: {
    handleApply(payload) {
      if (Array.isArray(payload)) {
        const [mainRange, comparisonRange] = payload;
        this.applyMainRange(mainRange);
        this.applyComparisonRange(comparisonRange);
      } else {
        this.applyMainRange(payload);
      }
    },
    
    applyMainRange(rangeStr) {
      const [start, end] = rangeStr.split('-');
      this.startDate = start;
      this.endDate = end;
    },
    
    applyComparisonRange(rangeStr) {
      // Handle comparison range if needed
    },
    
    formatDateToSlash(date) {
      const d = new Date(date);
      const month = String(d.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0');
      const day = String(d.getDate()).padStart(2, '0');
      const year = d.getFullYear();
      return `${month}/${day}/${year}`;
    },
    
    formatDate(date) {
      const d = new Date(date);
      const day = String(d.getDate()).padStart(2, '0');
      const month = String(d.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0');
      const year = d.getFullYear();
      return `${month}/${day}/${year}`;
    }
  }
};
</script>
